answers.answer: There are no doctors on this forum, only patients like yourself assisting other patients with our volunteered time and advice. Diabetes body odor has a sweet smell, somewhat fruity smell, and nothing like what you've described. When the body produces a foul smelling odor resembling rotten eggs, it is a sign of liver problems or disease. You need to see a doctor and get thoroughly checked before it worsens into a life threatening state. CBC [complete blood check], liver panel tests, and test for hepatitis a, b, and c are good starting points. Good luck.
Thank you wave rider for your suggestions.i will go as quickly as possible for my body tests that u suggest me .Thanx again.
You're welcome and best of luck. Be sure to ask for a copy of your lab results.

question: Hello Dr,my name is jimmy and my problem is that my body is smell very bad.I have been smelling a "musty" odor since last 4-5 years before it i am normal like other peoples.i really don't know whats going with me from last 4-5 months .there is nothing change in my life in this 4-5 years except before it i m a school boy and now i just completed my collage and doing a job in private company.i dont have any serious physical problem in this 4-5 years so why suddenly this problem is occur with me.my body is smelling like musty ,like rotten eggs and other different smells that i don't know how to explain it in words.my body is not continuously smell.once it smell morning,once in night ,once in evening and some time in afternoon.sometime the whole day my body is smelling ,some time whole day it isn't.I smell bad even 10 minutes after a shower.I'm  really tired and irritable all the time.i could not go outside my home and in between public.i really dont what problem is going with me so how will i treat this ?.I actually cant take this anymore. some one said me to test for a diabetes.may i have a dibetes problem..? .Please give me some suggestions. Thanx
title: Unknown problem
